channel.title: CVE Feed for WC Lovers -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WC Lovers -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-29929|2024-08-02T01:17:58.660Z -- wc%20lovers -- wcfm%20%E2%80%93%20frontend%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WC Lovers WCFM – Frontend Manager for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WCFM – Frontend Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 6.7.8.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WC Lovers WCFM – Frontend Manager for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WCFM – Frontend Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 6.7.8.
